amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $500,000 for each of the fiscal years 2008 through 2010 for a United States contribution to the Post-Operations Humanitarian Relief Fund of the U.N. International Security Assistance Force.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 110-174 to divert $500,000 in authorization authority for the United States contribution to the Post-Operations Humanitarian Relief Fund of the International Security Assistance Force (ISAF).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 260 (Roll no. 436).
